remarks: An assertion holding in atomic orthomodular lattices that is equivalent to the exchange axiom.  Proposition P8(ii) of [BeltramettiCassinelli1] p. 400.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
atoml.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
atoml2i $p |- ( ( B e. HAtoms /\ -. B C_ A ) -> ( ( A vH B ) i^i ( _|_ ` A ) ) e. HAtoms ) $.
